code:
sequenceDiagram
    loop Daily query
        Alice->>Bob: Hello Bob, how are you?
        alt is sick
            Bob->>Alice: Not so good :(
        else is well
            Bob->>Alice: Feeling fresh like a daisy
        end

        opt Extra response
            Bob->>Alice: Thanks for asking
        end
    end

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 首先，我们需要定义流程的起点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 关于Not so good :(、Feeling fresh like a daisy，你有什么想法？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我的意思是Not so good :(、Feeling fresh like a daisy应该这样理解...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我的意思是Not so good :(、Feeling fresh like a daisy应该这样理解...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 你能详细说明一下Not so good :(、Feeling fresh like a daisy吗？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们应该如何处理Thanks for asking？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 最终，我们在Thanks for asking完成整个流程。
